allow: Bash(echo "Checking commit count with attribution..." git log --format="%h")
Bash(# Check for crash logs find ~/Library/Logs/DiagnosticReports -name ""Murmur*"" -mmin -5)
Bash(# Check for recent crash logs ls -la ~/Library/Logs/DiagnosticReports/)
Bash(# List recent crash logs ls -la ~/Library/Logs/DiagnosticReports/)
